segment.source: In this section, you will learn about managing battery life when you deploy Windows 8 and Windows Server® 2012 on different hardware and software platforms.
segment.target: In this section, you will learn about managing battery life when you deploy Windows 8 and Windows Server® 2012 on different hardware and software platforms.

segment.source: Managing Battery Life and Power Consumption Overview
segment.target: Managing Battery Life and Power Consumption Overview

segment.source: Describes considerations that can help you to meet battery life goals, and lists common Windows® power policy settings that can affect battery life.
segment.target: Describes considerations that can help you to meet battery life goals, and lists common Windows® power policy settings that can affect battery life.

segment.source: Describes how to import a power plan and how to set a power plan to the active power plan.
segment.target: Describes how to import a power plan and how to set a power plan to the active power plan.

segment.source: Describes how to create a power plan by using Control Panel, how to export the power plan, and how to import the power plan on a destination computer.
segment.target: Describes how to create a power plan by using Control Panel, how to export the power plan, and how to import the power plan on a destination computer.

segment.source: Describes how to configure a customized Windows power plan by using powercfg command-line options.
segment.target: Describes how to configure a customized Windows power plan by using powercfg command-line options.

segment.source: Test Battery Life and Power Consumption
segment.target: Test Battery Life and Power Consumption

segment.source: Describes how to test power consumption.
segment.target: Describes how to test power consumption.

segment.source: Mobile Battery Life Solutions: A Guide for Mobile Platform Professionals
segment.target: Mobile Battery Life Solutions: A Guide for Mobile Platform Professionals

segment.source: Power Policy Configuration and Deployment in Windows
segment.target: Power Policy Configuration and Deployment in Windows
